## json.enhancedDeserialize() function

增强版JSON反序列化 支持恢复JavaScript特殊类型

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function enhancedDeserialize<T = any>(data: string, options?: EnhancedDeserializeOptions): {
    success: boolean;
    data?: T;
    error?: string;
};
```
